title: Match de Prestidigitation
brief_description: A magician divides himself into two people, who then perform tricks before transforming back into one person, in one of Georges Méliès’ early trick films that pioneered special effects.

constellations_other.name: Lost and found
constellations_other.description: Blossoming from Alice Guy Blaché’s The Cabbage-Patch Fairy, this Constellation explores the impermanence and enduring nature of the moving image.

description: A magician divides himself into two people, who then perform tricks before transforming back into one person, in one of Georges Méliès’ early trick films that pioneered special effects.
